mapper.sql: ID, ORDER_NO, NOTIFY_URL, NEXT_NOTIFY_DATE, NOTIFY_TIMES, NOTIFY_STATUS, NODE_NAME, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_notify_wait ( ORDER_NO, NOTIFY_URL, NEXT_NOTIFY_DATE, NOTIFY_TIMES, NOTIFY_STATUS, NODE_NAME, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{orderNo}, #{notifyUrl}, #{nextNotifyDate}, #{notifyTimes}, #{notifyStatus}, #{nodeName}, #{createBy}, NOW(), #{updateBy}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE order_notify_wait SET ORDER_NO = #{orderNo}, NOTIFY_URL = #{notifyUrl}, NEXT_NOTIFY_DATE = #{nextNotifyDate}, NOTIFY_TIMES = #{notifyTimes}, NOTIFY_STATUS = #{notifyStatus}, NODE_NAME = #{nodeName}, UPDATE_BY = #{createBy}, UPDATE_DATE = NOW() WHERE ID = #{id}
